thread.title: Fred Miller
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Fred Miller

author: Fred Miller
title: Fred Miller
text:
Otticanet was superb to deal with. Although the delivery of my order was delayed by several weeks, the service and updating by Otticanet personnel was prompt and very helpful.
The pricing on products purchased was excellent and delivery albeit late was worth the wait!
I highly recommend and would use Otticanet again.
